sQuestion: There are 9 pencils and 4 rulers in the drawer . Sally took 4 pencils out of the drawer . How many pencils are there now ?
Jason has 7 violet balloons and 4 red balloons . He lost 3 of the violet balloons . How many violet balloons does Jason have now ?
Dan had 7 potatoes and 4 cantelopes in the garden . The rabbits ate 4 of the potatoes . How many potatoes does Dan now have ?
Sara had 4 quarters and 8 dimes in her bank . Her sister borrowed 4 dimes . How many dimes does Sara have now ?
Sandy 's dog had 8 puppies and 4 had spots . She gave 4 to her friends . How many puppies does she now have ?
Mike found 6 seashells and 4 starfish , but 4 of the seashells were broken . How many unbroken seashells did Mike find ?
Melanie had 30 baseball cards , and 9 were torn . Sara bought 18 of Melanie 's baseball cards . How many baseball cards does Melanie have now ?
Sara picked 35 pears and 27 apples from the orchard . She gave 28 pears to Dan . How many pears does Sara have ?
Jessica grew 35 watermelons and 30 carrots , but the rabbits ate 27 watermelons . How many watermelons does Jessica have ?
Nancy found 35 seashells and 25 starfish on the beach . She gave 17 of the seashells to Jason . How many seashells does Nancy now have ?
